Name: Niagara Falls
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Flute glass .
Prepare garnish of physalis (cape gooseberry) or quarter orange slice wheel.
STRAIN into chilled glass whilst also pouring ginger ale.
Garnish with physalis or orange slice on rim.
Review: Ginger ale and orange complement each other, fortified by vodka.
Nutrition: One serving of Niagara Falls contains 157 calories
